text: John E. Otto (December 18, 1938 â€“ April 22, 2020) was an American government official. He was the Acting Director of the FBI in 1987. Otto died on April 22, 2020 in Norman, Oklahoma at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Directors of the Federal Bureau of Investigation Category:Politicians from Saint Paul, Minnesota
title: John E. Otto
